column2: ENGLISH
Religious Unrest From Holy Wars

The religious majority in this province are agitated due to recently being conquered in holy war. Such religious integration is always a struggle, so the local religious majority may prove a bit... uncooperative for some time, at the very least. However, since a gentle approach to their integration was chosen by the holy warrior, negative effects are fewer.

Religious Majority Recently Liberated
The local religious majority have recently been liberated from infidel overlords. Consequently, the province is experiencing a period of relative prosperity and order.

To the infidel dog [Root.GetFirstName],\n\nYour false [Root.EMF_GetGodHas] abandoned you to the ignominy of defeat by the supreme will of [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetHighGodName]. You would be wise to abandon your beliefs as well and bend the knee to me--to the true [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetName] faith, or you will lose more than just your dignity.

To the misguided [Root.GetTitledName],\n\nYour liege's folly and faith in [Root.Liege.GetPossPronoun] false [Root.Liege.EMF_GetGodWas] laughably inadequate in holding back the assault on [Root.Liege.GetPossPronoun] lands. You, however, I trust are wise enough to accept the same offer I gave [Root.Liege.GetObjectPronoun]: bend the knee and convert to the [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetName] faith, or your lands are mine.

My dear [Root.EMF_GetSisterBrotherNoRelation] in faith,\n\nThough we both must bow before the will of [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetHighGodName], you must bend the knee to me. Will you submit and aid me in bringing the true Faith to these lands, or will you place yourself on the side of these infidels?
Who am I to contend with [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetRandomGodName]? I will swear fealty to my new [emf_cb_winner.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle].
Finally, I can serve a liege that follows [emf_cb_winner.GetHighGodName].
I will bow before their false idols, but in my heart I stand blameless before [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
I'll never dirty my knees before these [emf_cb_winner.Culture.GetName] fools!
I'll never bend the knee to these [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetName] infidels!
I'd rather lose my land than lose my soul.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nOur new liege [emf_cb_winner.GetTitledFirstName] in [emf_cb_winner.GetPossPronoun] infinite mercy has extended us the opportunity to forsake our false [emf_old_religion.EMF_GetGodGods] and embraced [emf_cb_winner.GetRandomGodName]. I implore you to reconsider your errant ways and convert to the true [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetName] faith.
I'll follow my liege and embrace the [emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetName] faith.
Rather than truly embrace this faith, I'll make it serve me instead.
My heart cannot forsake [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I cannot follow you in this.

Our glorious [Root.EMF_GetGHWName] against the [emf_cb_loser.EMF_GetInfidelHeathen] [emf_cb_loser.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] has finally come to an end with the capitulation of [emf_cb_loser.GetTitledFirstName], a fool for resisting the unstoppable advance of my armies and the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nBut victory is not yet complete: the knees of many have not yet bent, and the hearts of many more have not yet learned [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s truth. I now must decide upon how to bring these people into the fold.
Let us tread lightly, for such dramatic change takes time.
We must use our authority to show them the righteous way.
Whether by word or by sword, the [emf_cb_loser.EMF_GetInfidelHeathen]s must submit!

In a demonstration of unlikely wisdom, [emf_cb_loser.GetTitledFirstName] chose to swear fealty as my vassal lord and embrace our [Root.EMF_GetGodGods]. Though I would not be able to seize [emf_cb_loser.GetHerHis] titles for my own, I have won a greater victory for our now shared faith.

[emf_cb_loser.GetTitledFirstName] threw my ultimatum in my face and refused to submit. However, some of [emf_cb_loser.GetPossPronoun] vassals broke with [emf_cb_loser.GetPossPronoun] refusal and have offered to swear fealty as my own vassal lords and embrace our [Root.EMF_GetGodGods].

Sadly for the [emf_cb_loser.EMF_GetInfidelHeathen]s, not so much as one of them was willing to accept my terms. In fitting recompense for their defiance, all of their lands within the [emf_cb_title.GetFullBaseName] are now mine.
That'll do.
That'll do, even if no counties were seized.
So be it, even if no [Root.EMF_GetInfidelHeathen] lords converted.
But I'll take [emf_prov_1.GetName] for myself.
But I'll take [emf_prov_2.GetName] for myself.
But I'll take [emf_prov_3.GetName] for myself.
Converted Religion Together
Converted Religion Together
RelSub Disinherited (TOM)
Disrespected Holy War Peace Treaty
Refused to Convert Religion with Me
Submitted to Infidel Conqueror
Refused My Holy War Ultimatum (TOM)
Infidel Will Bend The Knee And Convert (TOM)
will consider converting too.\n
I'll continue practicing the [Root.SecretReligion.GetName] faith privately...\n

§GAdvantages:§!
(§Y*§!) Since the conquered are more likely to refuse your ultimatum, more titles can be seized directly
(§Y*§!) Proselytization in the conquered territory will be much more rapid for awhile

§PDisadvantages:§!
(§Y*§!) Religious rebellions from the territory in coming years will be more likely
(§Y*§!) More severe temporary occupation penalties from the conquest

§GAdvantages:§!
(§Y*§!) Less difficulty in the coming years with religious rebellions
(§Y*§!) Less severe and shorter occupation penalties from the conquest
(§Y*§!) The conquered are more likely to accept ultimatum terms

§PDisadvantages:§!
(§Y*§!) Since fewer rulers will refuse your ultimatum, fewer titles can be seized directly
(§Y*§!) Proselytization in the conquered territory will be impeded for awhile
§GLORDS WHO WILL BEND THE KNEE:§!\n
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§ will lose all land inside the §Y[emf_cb_title.GetFullName]§!:\n
In my court, my kin will convert with me.\n

In my court, my kin will convert to the §Y[emf_cb_winner.Religion.GetName]§! faith with me to keep up appearances...

...but, in secret and as the infidel dogs run along to other foes, we will all still celebrate [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
The same-tier [Root.EMF_GetTierNoun] title(s) of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will be usurped.\n

§GSTATISTICS:§!
Counties to seize: §Y[Root.emf_relsub_counties_taken.GetValue]§! (Baronies: §Y[Root.emf_relsub_baronies_taken.GetValue]§!)
Rulers to convert: §Y[Root.emf_relsub_lords_converted.GetValue]§! (Nobles: §Y[Root.emf_relsub_nobles_converted.GetValue]§!)
[Root.Religion.GetName] rulers to liberate: §Y[Root.emf_relsub_lords_liberated.GetValue]§!
§GTITLES TO BE SEIZED:§!\n
will become a vassal of §Y[emf_cb_winner.GetBestName]§!.\n

§Y[From.GetBestName]§! and [From.GetPossPronoun] relevant vassals will choose to either bend the knee and embrace the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! faith or lose all of their lands within the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!...\n
The same peace offer will be offered to all of the direct vassals of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! with land inside the §Y[emf_cb_title.GetFullName]§!.\n
